New Records: Ronald Acuña Jr. became the first player in the majors to steal 70 bases and hit 40 home runs in a season.
Key Match Events: Ozzie Albies drove in the game-winning run with a single in the 10th inning.
Ronald Acuña Jr. stole two bases in the game, including the 70th stolen base of the season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in Atlanta.
Others: Darius Vines made his second big league start for the injury-plagued Braves.
